title:
what builder or subdivision is going to be off myrtle grove rd right before sentry oaks? The road is paved and mailboxes are in (all 25 of them) There is no information whatsoever on this new area.



Thanks!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/08/what-subdivision-is-going-in-off-myrtle-grove-road-right-before-sentry-oaks/
